name: Floral Disaffect
description:
Servitor's friend Ouiki is kidnapped by the Nightmare Cult. A girl with plants growing out of her offers to help, seeing as her sisters were also taken. Servitor is part of the dreamer cult, and Ouiki's ultimate dream is to destroy the Nightmare Cult once and for all.

Will Servitor be able to form a team and achieve the dreams that wont stop flowing unendingly in Ouiki's mind?
